main.subtitle: Instant Bitcoin Payments.
main.text: Platform for companies through which they can receive their payments in Bitcoin, compatible with existing wallets on the market such as: the Wasabi, Zeus, Blue Wallet, Wallet of Satoshi and the Chivo Wallet.
